ValidationRule.description: If Area of Focus is Recording Support other fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator",NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ISPICKVAL(Area_of_Focus__c,'Recording Support'), ( ISPICKVAL(Recording_Type__c, '') || ISBLANK(Recording_Start_Date_Time__c) || ISPICKVAL(Recording_Replay_Email__c, '') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If your Area of Focus is Recording Support, then you must populate a value in the following fields: Recording Type, Recording Start Date/Time, and Recording Replay Email.
